user-type.choice-has-ssn: I have a Norwegian national identification number or d-number
user-type.choice-no-ssn: I do not have a Norwegian national identification number or d-number
user-type.choice-other: Several people at the same time or workplace scheme organizers, course organizers and other businesses

contact-information.nav-unit-contact-legend: Have you been in contact with Nav about this case earlier?
contact-information.nav-unit-select-label: Which Nav unit have you been in contact with?

nav-unit-input.label: Select which Nav unit that should receive your documents

validationSummaryTitle: To proceed, you must correct the following:

error.not-found-heading: Sorry, we couldn't find the page
error.404-error-message: This page may have been deleted or moved, or there is an error in the link.
error.500-error-message: A technical error on our servers makes the page unavailable. This is not caused by anything you did.
error.500-error-problem-persists: If the problem persists, you can
error.500-error-contact-us-new-tab: contact us (opens in a new tab)
error.500-error-previous-page: go back to the previous page
error.url-feedback: If you clicked on a link that brought you here, we would appreciate it if you report which link you clicked on.
error.report-error: Report an error on this link
error.attachment-not-allowed: It is not possible to submit attachments for this form. If you clicked on a link that brought you here, we would appreciate it if you report which link you clicked on.
error.digital-only: It is only possible to <FormUrl>submit digitally</FormUrl> for this form. You will be asked to log in.
error.paper-only: It is only possible to <FormUrl>submit attachments</FormUrl> for this form by mail.
